dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Chuuni-Chan, it was because of this type of behaviour that you got detention remember?

dialogue.name: Chuuni
dialogue.dialogueText: Ah, don’t remind me...that was a long three weeks.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Chuuni’s eyes drifted off into the distance like someone remembering something incredibly life-changing.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Was the detention really that bad? I wonder what could’ve happened to her when she went there...

dialogue.name: Chuuni
dialogue.dialogueText: Well whatever! I will be waiting outside Takeshi-Kun, so please try not to take too much longer okay?

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I finished my business and washed my hands.
